text: Did “ Bachelorette ” Becca Kufrin choose Garrett Yrigoyen or Blake Horstmann on Monday ’ s finale? Warning : Spoilers Ahead After months of rumors, Becca gave her final rose to controversial contestant Garrett. As the show unfolded, Becca was conflicted over who to choose. She introduced the suitors to her family, but they weren ’ t much help. Her sister told her Garrett was “ incredible, ” adding, “ I felt like I had known him for years. ” After meeting Blake, her sister liked him, too, saying, “ I feel like Blake would challenge you and he would be more of a teammate. You just need to decide what you want. ” From there, it was time for the romantic final dates in the Maldives. At the end of their date, Garrett g
